description:
Based in Philadelphia, Kline & Specter, PC, is one of the pre-eminent personal injury law firms in the nation. Backed by a strong tradition of successful litigation, Kline & Specter has achieved more eight-figure verdicts and settlements than any other personal injury firm in Pennsylvania.

If you have been injured and are considering a lawsuit, it pays to have a skilled personal injury attorney on your side. Kline & Specter has more than 40 attorneys, five of whom are also medical doctors – the most doctor/lawyers of any firm in the United States.

The firm offers comprehensive legal representation across a broad range of practice areas, including medical malpractice, product liability and whistleblower litigation. No matter how challenging your case may be, Kline & Specter has the resources and experience necessary to provide exemplary legal service.

The firm’s reputation is backed by awards and recognition from across the country. Individually, Tom Kline has been named by Super Lawyers as the No. 1 attorney in Pennsylvania for 16 straight years – a record for any lawyer anywhere in the country -- while Shanin Specter is a perennial Top 10 selection. Both are members of the Inner Circle of Advocates, an invitation-only group made up of 100 of the nation’s top lawyers, and the International Academy of Trial Lawyers, whose U.S. membership is limited to just 500 lawyers.

If you have been injured due to another party’s negligence, get help from a lawyer with a proven record of success. To schedule a free initial consultation with one of the attorneys at Kline & Specter, contact the firm by phone or email. All cases are taken on a contingent fee basis – the firm will never charge fees unless you recover compensation in your case.
